com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bp7sControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bp7sControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Bp7sControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the BP7S

    The class provides methods to control BP7S device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a BP7S device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new BP7S device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect BP7S device.
